meta.name: ZMCS Template
meta.author: ZakatFlow
meta.description: Template configuration for Zakat Methodology Configuration Standard (ZMCS). Customize this file to define your own Zakat calculation methodology.
meta.tooltip: Template configuration for Zakat Methodology. Customize to define your own rules.

nisab.description: Uses silver standard (lower threshold) as the safer option for ensuring Zakat obligations are met.
nisab.tooltip: Define Nisab (minimum wealth) and Zakat rates.

zakat_rate.description: Standard 2.5% lunar rate. Solar rate adjusted for 365-day year.
zakat_rate.tooltip: Standard 2.5% lunar rate. Solar rate adjusted for 365-day year.

cash.description: All liquid cash holdings are fully zakatable.
cash.tooltip: All liquid cash holdings are generally zakatable.

jewelry.description: All gold and silver jewelry is zakatable regardless of personal use.
jewelry.scholarly_basis: Precautionary position: gold and silver are monetary by nature.

crypto.description: Cryptocurrency is treated as equivalent to gold/silver.

passive_investments.description: 30% proxy rule for underlying zakatable assets.
passive_investments.scholarly_basis: Based on AAOIFI Shariah Standard No. 9.

dividends.description: Dividend income is zakatable after purification.

investments.description: Active trading: full value. Passive: 30% proxy.

retirement.scholarly_basis: Lack of complete ownership (milk tām) until access.

rental_property.description: Property value exempt. Net rental income zakatable.

for_sale.description: Property listed for sale is trade goods.

land_banking.description: Undeveloped land held for appreciation is zakatable.

real_estate.description: Personal property exempt. Trade property zakatable.

business.description: Zakat on liquid assets and inventory. Fixed assets exempt.
business.scholarly_basis: Trade goods and liquid assets are zakatable.

debts_owed_to_user.description: Good debts zakatable. Bad debts zakatable on recovery.
debts_owed_to_user.tooltip: Debts owed to you by others.

personal_debt.description: Deduct debts due within the coming year (12-month rule).

liabilities.description: Debts due within 12 months are deductible.
liabilities.tooltip: Debts you owe that may reduce your zakatable wealth.
